name: Sproy (DEMO)
description:
Sproy is a puzzle-platformer where the environment changes when you change the seasons! Use the four seasons to reach the goal!

This version of Sproy was developed in two weeks for My First Game Jam: Summer 2020.

This is a demo: more features to come as we continue development! Follow development on Twitter with #sproygame!

Developed by Icedragn, wildflyer, camkatsu
Art by camkatsu

Menu music by FoolBoyMedia

Thank you for playing!
